name: Weekend on the solar system
description:
I cutted and mixed this art with old magazines, the new image bring a vintage taste projected in the future.
I like to think we can travel different dimensions, like this old couple, just spending a weekend around the solar system. It may shows as well the limitless bond that romance can bring againts any future new horizonts.
By working with old travel magazine from Europe, i save into time capsule some piece of papers, that were never digitilized and set them to explore in the long term for future generation.
(6157×6107)
